record.title: REMOVAL OF NAME OF MEMBER AS COSPONSOR OF H.R. 3554
record.narrative:
REMOVAL OF NAME OF MEMBER AS COSPONSOR OF H.R. 3554 -- (House of Representatives - October 04, 2007)

[Page: H11254]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, due to an error in my office, the name JOHN SALAZAR was added to the bill H.R. 3554, and I would ask unanimous consent that his name be removed from H.R. 3554.

record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentleman from Iowa?
